statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

article.headline: Coastal Carolina 80, The Citadel 58
article.story: CHARLESTON, S.C. -- Anthony Raffa scored 28 points and tallied five steals to lead Coastal Carolina over The Citadel 80-58 on Tuesday night. Raffa was 13 of 19 from the field as the Chanticleers (8-1) shot 56.7 percent as a team (34 of 60). Chris Gradnigo added 12 points and Kierre Greenwood 10 for Coastal Carolina, which won its third straight. The Chanticleers outrebounded The Citadel 37-28, leading to 12 second-chance points compared to just four by the Bulldogs (2-6). The Chanticleers also outscored the Bulldogs 42-18 in the paint. Coastal led 14-11 before blowing it open on a 21-3 run. Dexter Moore's 3 capped the spurt for a 35-14 Chanticleers' lead with 6:53 to play in the first half. Barry Smith led the Bulldogs with 15 points and DeVontae Wright added 10. The Citadel shot 37.7 percent from the field (20 of 53) in its fourth straight loss.
